alldb.table_sql:
select *from ( select rentplan.rentinvoiceid as rentinvoiceid, rentplan.rentinvoiceid as fundorrentid, ci.id as contractid, ci.contract_number as contractnum, cinfo.cust_name as custname, rentplan.taxtype as plantypeid, case rentplan.taxtype when 'corpusone' then '本金一次性开票' when 'rent' then '租金' when 'corpus' then '本金' when 'interest' then '利息' end as feetype, rentplan.rentlist as rentlist, rentplan.plandate as invoicedate, rentplan.planmoney as invoicemoney,
tds1.name_ as invoicetype, cit.tax_reg_code as taxregcode, cit.tax_bank as taxbank, cit.tax_acc as taxacc, cit.invoice_phone as taxtel, cit.invoice_add as taxaddr, case nvl(rentplan.invoice_status,0) when 0 then '未申请' when 1 then '已退回' when 2 then '已申请' end as status
from ( select rii.id as id,rii.id as rentinvoiceid,cfrp.contract_id as contractid,rii.tax_type as taxtype,exporttab.exportmoney as exportmoney, rii.invoice_status,cfrp.plan_date as plandate,cfrp.rent_list as rentlist, --case rii.tax_type when 'corpusone' then cfrp.corpus when 'rent' then cfrp.rent when 'corpus' then cfrp.corpus when 'interest' then cfrp.interest end planmoney rii.money as planmoney from rent_invoice_info rii left join contract_fund_rent_plan cfrp on rii.cfrp_id=cfrp.id left join ( select down.rent_invoice_id, nvl(sum(down.invoice_money),0) as exportmoney from rent_invoice_download_info down where down.rent_invoice_id is not null group by down.rent_invoice_id )exporttab on rii.id=exporttab.rent_invoice_id where --开票种类为发票 rii.cfrp_id is not null and rii.bill_type='invoice' --状态为已申请 and rii.invoice_status=2 and rii.tax_type!='corpusone'
union all
select corpusone.id as id,'' as rentinvoiceid,corpusone.contractid as contractid,corpusone.taxtype as taxtype,exporttab.exportmoney as exportmoney, corpusone.invoice_status,cc.start_date as plandate,1 as rentlist, case when (select td.description_ From t_dicts_datas td where td.id_='iscorpusone.01')='否' then nvl(cc.equip_amt,0)-nvl(cc.first_payment,0) else cc.equip_amt end as planmoney from ( select rii.contract_id as id,rii.contract_id as contractid,max(rii.tax_type) as taxtype, max(rii.invoice_status) as invoice_status from rent_invoice_info rii where --开票种类为发票 rii.bill_type='invoice' --状态为已申请 and rii.invoice_status=2 and rii.tax_type='corpusone' group by rii.contract_id ) corpusone left join ( select down.contract_id, nvl(sum(down.invoice_money),0) as exportmoney from rent_invoice_download_info down where down.rent_invoice_id is null group by down.contract_id )exporttab on corpusone.contractid=exporttab.contract_id
left join contract_condition cc on corpusone.contractid=cc.contract_id
)rentplan left join contract_info ci on rentplan.contractid=ci.id left join contract_invoice_type cit on ci.id=cit.contract_id left join t_dicts_datas tds1 on cit.invoice_type=tds1.id_ left join cust_info cinfo on ci.cust_id=cinfo.id
where 1=1 --状态为已申请 and rentplan.invoice_status=2
union all
select rii.id as rentinvoiceid, rii.id as fundorrentid, ci.contract_id as contractid, ci.contract_number as contractnum, cinfo.cust_name as custname, rii.tax_type as plantypeid, case rii.tax_type when 'corpusone' then '本金一次性开票' when 'rent' then '租金' when 'corpus' then '本金' when 'interest' then '利息' when 'penalty' then '罚息' end as feetype, cfri.plan_list as rentlist, cfri.hire_date as invoicedate,
case when rii.tax_type='rent' then cfrp.rent when rii.tax_type='corpus' then cfrp.corpus when rii.tax_type='interest' then cfrp.interest when rii.TAX_TYPE='penalty' then cfri.PENALTY end as invoicemoney,
tds1.name_ as invoicetype, cit.tax_reg_code as taxregcode, cit.tax_bank as taxbank, cit.tax_acc as taxacc, cit.invoice_phone as taxtel, cit.invoice_add as taxaddr, case nvl(rii.invoice_status,0) when 0 then '未申请' when 1 then '已退回' when 2 then '已申请' end as status
from rent_invoice_info rii left join contract_fund_rent_income cfri on rii.cfri_id=cfri.id left join contract_fund_rent_plan cfrp on cfri.plan_id=cfrp.id left join contract_info ci on cfri.contract_id=ci.id left join contract_condition cc on ci.id=cc.contract_id left join contract_invoice_type cit on ci.id=cit.contract_id left join t_dicts_datas tds1 on cit.invoice_type=tds1.id_ left join cust_info cinfo on ci.cust_id=cinfo.id left join ( select down.rent_invoice_id, nvl(sum(down.invoice_money),0) as exportmoney from rent_invoice_download_info down where down.rent_invoice_id is not null group by down.rent_invoice_id )exporttab on rii.id=exporttab.rent_invoice_id left join ( select ci.plan_id,ri.tax_type,sum(rdi.invoice_money) as invoicemoney from rent_invoice_download_info rdi left join rent_invoice_info ri on rdi.rent_invoice_id=ri.id left join contract_fund_rent_income ci on ri.cfri_id=ci.id group by ci.plan_id,ri.tax_type )planexport on cfri.plan_id=planexport.plan_id and rii.tax_type=planexport.tax_type
where 1=1 --实收开票 and rii.cfri_id is not null --开票种类为发票 and rii.bill_type='invoice' --状态为已申请 and rii.invoice_status=2 and rii.tax_type!='corpusone' )
where fundorrentid in (<<ids>>)
